channel.title: Outsourcing QA?
channel.description:
Any of you guys use an outsourced QA person?
Ideally I'd like to have a qa script I could run "on demand" with a reasonable turn around. I've heard some people use VAs but I'd really like to get somebody more experienced with software and not have to train them on how to write a bug report.
Any ideas?
Thanks!

item.title: Outsourcing QA?
item.dc:creator: jitbit
item.description:
We use scripted GUI testing. There are tons of libs (we are using WatiN under Windows).

Read full topic

item.title: Outsourcing QA?
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
Successful Software – 9 Dec 09

Outsourcing software testing

Every time I write a post for this blog I carefully check it for typos. I then get my wife to proof-read it. She always finds at least one typo. Often there will be whole words missing that my brai…

I still use testlab2.com .

Read full topic
